name: @hophiphip/opencv-js
description: OpenCV for JavaScript compiled with Emscripten

scripts.compile: npm run clean && docker run --rm --workdir /code -v "$PWD/build":/code --user $(id -u):$(id -g) emsdk-for-opencv:latest
scripts.compile:separate: npm run clean && docker run --rm --workdir /code -v "$PWD/build":/code -v "$PWD/docker/cmake-lists":/cmake-lists:ro --user $(id -u):$(id -g) --env CMAKE_OVERWRITE_FILE=/cmake-lists/separate/CMakeLists.txt emsdk-for-opencv:latest

author: hophiphip
